name: TAMU Chinese Language & Culture Club
description: To provide those who are learning Mandarin Chinese, and/or are generally interested in learning about Chinese culture as a whole, with a place where they can practice the language and learn about Chinese culture through various activities, while at the same time being connected with both others of the same interest and with Chinese students. In that way, that it would be a place that also generally facilitates cultural exchange between students not native to China and Chinese nationals, the hope being that Chinese students would come and also have a big part in contributing to the groups activities.
